title: Obligation of company to transfer shares acquired in contravention of this Law.
content: 57C. A company that acquires shares in contravention of the provisions of sections 57A and 57B shall have the obligation to transfer them within a time limit of a year at the latest from the date of completion of the act of their acquisition: Provided that if the shares in question are not transferred within that time-limit, then the provisions of sub-paragraph (3) of section 57B shall apply. Conditions to be met for the company to hold its own shares. 2 of 135(I) of 2000.
